body_html:
OK, instead of using:
feature_columns = tensorflow.contrib.learn.infer_real_valued_columns_from_input(totA.astype(np.float32))
I used:
feature_columns = tf.feature_column.numeric_column(key='totA', shape=totA.shape)

This still gives the exact same error.

body:
OK, instead of using:
`feature_columns = tensorflow.contrib.learn.infer_real_valued_columns_from_input(totA.astype(np.float32))`
I used:
`feature_columns = tf.feature_column.numeric_column(key='totA', shape=totA.shape)`
 
This still gives the exact same error.
